Talk_2_8:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>So you take an oil jar and Hylian rice... And then
you add in meat and a bird egg?

Darn it. Hungry again. Better hurry up and try this
one out soon.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, new guy, make sure you get crackin'
on that appetite now so breakfast is extra
tasty in the morning.
Talk_3_7:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>All you need to make some grub is <clr:0000>a pot
and some ingredients<clr:ffff>. I always tell folks
to give it a shot, even if they're new to it.
Talk_2_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh, hey there! <sp:5:0:0>I see I'm not the only one
who thought it was worth the trek to
come here.
You must really appreciate good cooking
if you're willing to sneak into the Hyrule
Castle dining hall.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This place is loaded with recipes I
couldn't have dreamed up myself!
It's all so inspiring.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I came all this way to find a special
recipe so I can treat everyone back
at Lookout Landing.
Nothing lifts the spirits like delicious food!
Talk_2_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>You need to cook a dish while you still
remember the recipe. That way you can
commit it to memory!
Talk_2_3:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Uh... The recipe I saw on that poster... Lessee...
It was Hylian rice, meat, a bird egg, and... <sp:5:1:0>Uh.

What was the last thing?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_2_4:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Come on, brain, you can do it! The recipe on that
poster had...

Hylian rice, meat, and...<sp:5:1:0> Ugh. Am I forgetting even
more of the ingredients now?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_2_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I wanted to make the recipe I saw
on the poster, but I can't remember
the ingredients.
Actually, I'd memorized them, but
one can never be too certain! Best
to double-check...
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Angry_00>I just want to be sure—that's all!
I definitely didn't forget!
Talk_3_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks for bringing me that ingredient.
You really saved my bacon.

Now I can give the search party plenty
of energy to keep up the hunt for
Princess Zelda.
If you need to cook, feel free to use this
here pot.
Talk_3_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>New guy! That meal you helped me cook?
Folks just loved it. <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You've got a real knack
for cooking.
Talk_2_7:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>So you take an oil jar and then you take some
Hylian rice... And add meat. Looks like any ol'
meat will do the trick.
Next, add in a bird egg and sauté it up. I see, I see.
Maybe I'll whip up this beauty later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
